title: The Stinger Recipe
full_text:
The Stinger Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
brandy
(or
bourbon
, or other spirit of your choice)
1/2
ounce
white crème de menthe
, to taste (to avoid an unappetizing color in your drink, be sure to use the white, rather than the green, crème de menthe)
Directions
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and fill with ice; shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass (you can instead pour it over shaved ice in an old fashioned glass, if you prefer). Garnish with a fresh mint leaf.
Whiskey
